name: BangShot
description:
Bangshot is best played on mobile devices. It is available for free on Google Play.

Load up the cannon, and defend yourself from waves of incoming space threats! Meteorites, Asteroids and UFOs are out to get you. Who'd ever think you were out to get them right back?

Tap to fire your cannon, go for combo shots and try to ramp up as many points as you can before running out of lives. 

Best of luck, cadet! 

This game was made by two industrial design students at NTNU, attempting to make 7 games in 14 weeks. This is the first of the 7 games.

Find @studiogauntlet on instagram to follow our progress.
